overview: Victoria Franchetti Haynes, Ph.D., became RTI Internationalâ€™s third president in 1999. Her career spans 31 years of technology leadership, management, and new business development. She began her career at Monsanto Company in 1977, and held a number of senior management positions, including director of technology in the companyâ€™s plastics division until 1992. Prior to joining RTI, she worked for seven years at Goodrich Corporation as vice president of research and development and later as chief technical officer and vice president of the companyâ€™s advanced technology group. Haynes currently serves as a corporate board member for Archer Daniels Midland Company; Nucor Corporation; PPG Industries, Inc.; and Ziptronix, Inc.
